title: Recommend a new Laser Printer for my design department?
content:
Good afternoon fellow folks of fonts,  
The company I work for is going to purchase a new printer for my department (Design Department). We are currently using a Recoh C8111... we'd like something as good or better. It's a Laser Toner, maximum size is 12x18 (via bypass tray). Any recommendations/experience to be shared?
author: theplatypus

comments.content: Some of the higher-priced Xerox Phaser models are used in design offices and do an excellent job. I believe the Phaser 7800 (around $4,000) is specifically recommended by Xerox for graphic artists, but they also have some lower-priced models.
